languages.text: [Глянуть на Соломона] "Как же это вы не догадались подослать к ним бойца посмазливее, чтобы он соблазнил их вожака?"
[Look at Solomorne] "How is it that you didn't think to send a handsome fighter to seduce their leader?"
languages.original_text: [Глянуть на Соломона] "Как же это вы не догадались подослать к ним бойца посмазливее, чтобы он соблазнил их вожака?"

traits.locale_text: [Look at Solomorne] "How come you didn't think to send a prettier fighter to seduce their leader?"
[Look at Solomorne] "How come you didn't think to send a prettier fighter to seduce their leader?"
[Look at Solomorne] "How come you didn't think to send a prettier fighter to seduce their leader?"
[Look at Solomorne] "How is it that you didn't think to send a handsome fighter to seduce their leader?"
[Look at Solomorne] "How is it that you didn't think to send a handsome fighter to seduce their leader?"

languages.text: [Solomorne ansehen] "Wie ist es, dass Ihr nicht daran dachtet, einen gut aussehenden Kämpfer zu entsenden, der ihren Anführer verführt?"
languages.original_text: [Look at Solomorne] "How is it that you didn't think to send a handsome fighter to seduce their leader?"

traits.locale_text: [Solomorne ansehen] "Wie ist es, dass Ihr nicht daran dachtet, einen gut aussehenden Kämpfer zu entsenden, der ihren Anführer verführt?"

languages.text: [Regarder Solomorne] « Pourquoi ne vous est-il pas venu à l'idée d'envoyer quelqu'un de plus amène pour séduire leur chef ? »
languages.original_text: [Look at Solomorne] "How is it that you didn't think to send a handsome fighter to seduce their leader?"

traits.locale_text: [Regarder Solomorne] « Pourquoi ne vous est-il pas venu à l'idée d'envoyer quelqu'un de plus amène pour séduire leur chef ? »
[Regarder Solomorne] « Pourquoi ne vous est-il pas venu à l'idée d'envoyer quelqu'un de plus amène pour séduire leur chef ? »

languages.text: [ソロモーンを見る]「なんで、もっと見た目のいい戦士を送り込んで、あいつらのリーダーを誘惑させるって発想が出なかったんだ？」
languages.original_text: [Look at Solomorne] "How is it that you didn't think to send a handsome fighter to seduce their leader?"

traits.locale_text: [ソロモーンを見る]「なんで、もっと見た目のいい戦士を送り込んで、あいつらのリーダーを誘惑させるって発想が出なかったんだ？」
[ソロモーンを見る]「なんで、もっと見た目のいい戦士を送り込んで、あいつらのリーダーを誘惑させるって発想が出なかったんだ？」

languages.text: [Mirar a Solomorne] «¿Cómo no se le ha ocurrido enviar a un guerrero apuesto a seducir a su líder?».
languages.original_text: [Look at Solomorne] "How is it that you didn't think to send a handsome fighter to seduce their leader?"

traits.locale_text: [Mirar a Solomorne] «¿Cómo no se le ha ocurrido enviar a un guerrero apuesto a seducir a su líder?».

languages.text: [看着索罗蒙]“你们怎么就没想过派一位英俊的战士去勾引叛军领袖呢？”
languages.original_text: [Look at Solomorne] "How is it that you didn't think to send a handsome fighter to seduce their leader?"

traits.locale_text: [看着索罗蒙]“你们怎么就没想过派一位英俊的战士去勾引叛军领袖呢？”
[看着索罗蒙]“你们怎么就没想过，派一位性感的战士去勾引叛军领袖呢？”

languages.text: [Solomorne'a bak] "Önderlerini baştan çıkarmak için yakışıklı bir savaşçı göndermeyi akıl edemedin mi?"
languages.original_text: [Look at Solomorne] "How is it that you didn't think to send a handsome fighter to seduce their leader?"

traits.locale_text: [Solomorne'a bak] "Önderlerini baştan çıkarmak için yakışıklı bir savaşçı göndermeyi akıl edemedin mi?"
[Solomorne'a bak] "Önderlerini baştan çıkarmak için çekici bir savaşçı göndermeyi akıl edemedin mi?"
